name: Retro Rocket
description: Retro Rocket is an oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its vibrant red body in the shade of rossoCorsa, it combines nostalgia and futuristic design. Its rocket-like arms and legs give it a sleek and agile appearance. The screen, adorned in red and black, displays data and visuals with precision and clarity. Retro Rocket is a unique and eye-catching member of the WebtrES club, ready to explore the digital world with its oscilloscope capabilities.
